itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway break down Joe Biden’s first executive orders including the orders on immigration, the Keystone XL Pipeline, and the Executive Branch Ethics Doctrine — plus Dan and Ross give their thoughts on the latest ANTIFA riots in Portland at the Oregon Democratic Headquarters, why Julian Assange doesn’t deserve a pardon, and the mass exodus of liberals from red states to blue states.
